causing an increase in the production of urine: diuretic drugs
More examplesFewer examplesA habitual coffee or iced tea drinker, for example, will probably not be greatly affected by the diuretic effect of these beverages. Caffeine: Diuretic stimulant found in coffee, tea, cola, nuts, mate and guarana.They were diuretic pills to encourage patients to get rid of excess water quickly.Unfortunately, many doctors don't look to this avenue of treatment, they are more likely to prescribe drugs which are diuretic.
